name: NH Berlin Frankfurter Allee

reviews.title: Super Hotel
reviews.text: Stayed in hotel from 28th December 2006 to 4th January 2007. As we are a family of five had two rooms, a double and a triple. (which was a double with a fold away bed added, so a little on the small side).
Requested adjoining rooms and request was granted.
reviews.title: great hotel
Great Hotel.
reviews.text: Hotel was warm with plentiful hot water.
Close to s-bahn and u-bahn so travel around Berlin was straightforward.
reviews.title: Berlin is alive and very well indeed!
We loved Berlin
reviews.text: Breakfast was plentiful and staff there were particularly nice. All staff spoke good English.

The Premier City-Con was a totally OK hotel. Their 4-star rating is definitely below the Scandinavian 4-star rating, probably 3 stars at the most (but hey, that goes for most German hotels). The staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was really good, so was their coffee. The rooms are clean and tidy and have everything you might need. The S-Bahn and U-Bahn stations, also the tram stops are nearby. It takes only 10-15 minutes to get to Alexander Platz from there. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Totally OK

aka: Nh Berlin Frankfurter Allee Hotel Berlin
